summary: A small change to the looks of the dragon scale helm.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][u]Update 1: Added an alternate version with changes mentioned by some users[/u][/i][/b]. :)

Modified dragon scale helm that replaces the original that Bethesda had made.
This Is an early release, as I have not yet made the models for Argonian's or the Khajiit.

Also, this mod uses Vanilla textures, so it should be compatible with any texture replacement mods.

Tools used:

Blender 2.49b
NifSkope
CK

Thanx:

Bethesda for Skyrim
All the great people involved with the creation of Blender and the nif scripts
And all modders for continuing to make Skyrim what it is :)

Permissions:

This is for Nexus only and may not be uploaded anywhere else without my permission.
If you would like to use this in one of your own mods, send me a PM. :)
author: Scroll Thief
